title: Champlain pet clinic
description: This project involves collaboration with five other partners within a microservices framework. Each of us works independently on a specific service, separate from the others in the group. For this project, focused on a pet clinic, we chose to develop the inventory service.

title: DreamDefendersProject
description: This project involves creating a game in collaboration with three other partners. We are using Unity as our development platform to build a tower defense-style game.

title: Coupe Ton Arbre
description: This project is a collaboration within a team of four, using our skills to build a fully functional website for a company specializing in tree-cutting services.
